name: wssubscriber
title: Websocket Subscriber
description: Websocket Subscriber connects to a websocket server and reads the data over connection

settings.description: The websocket uri to connect to.

display.name: URI

display.name: Allow Insecure Connection
display.description: Enable to support self signed CA's

display.name: Server CA
display.description: Select the PEM encoded certificate authority file used to sign the server's certificate

settings.name: headers
settings.description: HTTP request header params. Header key gets converted in to canonical format, i.e. the first letter and any letter following a hyphen to upper case, the rest are converted to lowercase. For example, the canonical key for "accept-encoding" and "host" are "Accept-Encoding" and "Host" respectively

settings.name: autoReconnectAttempts
settings.description: Specifies the number of times the client trigger attempts to automatically reconnect to the server following a loss of connection

display.name: AutoReconnectAttempts
display.description: Specifies the number of times the client attempts to automatically reconnect to the server following a loss of connection

settings.name: autoReconnectMaxDelay
settings.description: Determines the maximum delay between auto reconnect attempts in seconds

display.name: AutoReconnectMaxDelay
